item.description: Houses in this country can be had for far cheaper than almost anyone realizes.

item.description: Ever wonder how remote you can go without sacrificing internet connectivity?

item.title: GUIDE: the best place to buy land for homesteading
item.description: There is no clean, “one size fits all” answer to the question, “Where is the best place to buy land for homesteading?

item.title: Links for June
item.description: The possession of a cow or two, with a hog, and a few geese, naturally exalts the peasant.

item.title: The Best Self-Sufficiency Blogs
item.description: Here are my favorite self-sufficiency blogs, along with links to content I particularly enjoyed. Note that I continue to expand this list whenever good articles hit my RSS reader. Last updated 06/26.

item.title: Where is homeschooling most popular? States by the numbers
item.description: Surprisingly, no one has published homeschooling rates per capita for different states, so I’ve mashed together some census data to figure that out.
